name: Python Dev Container
postCreateCommand: python3 -m venv /mnt/extra-addons/.venv && /mnt/extra-addons/.venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && ([ -f /mnt/extra-addons/requirements.txt ] && /mnt/extra-addons/.venv/bin/pip install --no-cache-dir -r /mnt/extra-addons/requirements.txt || echo 'No requirements.txt found, skipping...') && echo 'if [ -f /mnt/extra-addons/.venv/bin/activate ]; then source /mnt/extra-addons/.venv/bin/activate; fi' >> /home/odoo/.bashrc
